cwipp.Plume¶

class cwipp.Plume(name)¶

Parent Plume class.

name¶

plume name

Type:str
zi¶

boundary layer height [m]

Type:float
zs¶

refernce height (zi * BLfrac) [m]

Type:float
sounding¶

vertical potential temperature sounding on interpolated analysis levels [K]

Type:ndarray
THs¶

ambient potential tempreature at reference height zs [K]

Type:float
I¶

fireline intensity parameter [K m2 s-1]

Type:float
wf¶

characteristic fire velocity scale [m s-1]

Type:float
Tau¶

characteristic timescale [s]

Type:float

Methods

__init__(name) Constructs the plume object with some inital attributes
classify() Classifies the plume as penetrative (True) or boundary layer (False)
get_sounding(T0) Calculates attributes relating to vertical potential temperature profile
get_wf() Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.
